00021 btCapsuleShape::btCapsuleShape(btScalar radius, btScalar height) : btConvexInternalShape ()
00022 {
00023         m_collisionMargin = radius;
00024         m_shapeType = CAPSULE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE;
00025         m_upAxis = 1;
00026         m_implicitShapeDimensions.setValue(radius,0.5f*height,radius);
00027 }
00028 
00029  
00030  btVector3      btCapsuleShape::localGetSupportingVertexWithoutMargin(const btVector3& vec0)const
00031 {
00032 
00033         btVector3 supVec(0,0,0);
00034 
00035         btScalar maxDot(btScalar(-BT_LARGE_FLOAT));
00036 
00037         btVector3 vec = vec0;
00038         btScalar lenSqr = vec.length2();
00039         if (lenSqr < btScalar(0.0001))
00040         {
00041                 vec.setValue(1,0,0);
00042         } else
00043         {
00044                 btScalar rlen = btScalar(1.) / btSqrt(lenSqr );
00045                 vec *= rlen;
00046         }
00047 
00048         btVector3 vtx;
00049         btScalar newDot;
00050         
00051         
00052 
00053         {
00054                 btVector3 pos(0,0,0);
00055                 pos[getUpAxis()] = getHalfHeight();
00056 
00057                 vtx = pos;
00058                 newDot = vec.dot(vtx);
00059                 if (newDot > maxDot)
00060                 {
00061                         maxDot = newDot;
00062                         supVec = vtx;
00063                 }
00064         }
00065         {
00066                 btVector3 pos(0,0,0);
00067                 pos[getUpAxis()] = -getHalfHeight();
00068 
00069                 vtx = pos;
00070                 newDot = vec.dot(vtx);
00071                 if (newDot > maxDot)
00072                 {
00073                         maxDot = newDot;
00074                         supVec = vtx;
00075                 }
00076         }
00077 
00078         return supVec;
00079 
00080 }
00081 
00082  void   btCapsuleShape::batchedUnitVectorGetSupportingVertexWithoutMargin(const btVector3* vectors,btVector3* supportVerticesOut,int numVectors) const
00083 {
00084 
00085         
00086         
00087         for (int j=0;j<numVectors;j++)
00088         {
00089                 btScalar maxDot(btScalar(-BT_LARGE_FLOAT));
00090                 const btVector3& vec = vectors[j];
00091 
00092                 btVector3 vtx;
00093                 btScalar newDot;
00094                 {
00095                         btVector3 pos(0,0,0);
00096                         pos[getUpAxis()] = getHalfHeight();
00097                         vtx = pos;
00098                         newDot = vec.dot(vtx);
00099                         if (newDot > maxDot)
00100                         {
00101                                 maxDot = newDot;
00102                                 supportVerticesOut[j] = vtx;
00103                         }
00104                 }
00105                 {
00106                         btVector3 pos(0,0,0);
00107                         pos[getUpAxis()] = -getHalfHeight();
00108                         vtx = pos;
00109                         newDot = vec.dot(vtx);
00110                         if (newDot > maxDot)
00111                         {
00112                                 maxDot = newDot;
00113                                 supportVerticesOut[j] = vtx;
00114                         }
00115                 }
00116                 
00117         }
00118 }

00121 void    btCapsuleShape::calculateLocalInertia(btScalar mass,btVector3& inertia) const
00122 {
00123         //as an approximation, take the inertia of the box that bounds the spheres
00124 
00125         btTransform ident;
00126         ident.setIdentity();
00127 
00128         
00129         btScalar radius = getRadius();
00130 
00131         btVector3 halfExtents(radius,radius,radius);
00132         halfExtents[getUpAxis()]+=getHalfHeight();
00133 
00134         btScalar lx=btScalar(2.)*(halfExtents[0]);
00135         btScalar ly=btScalar(2.)*(halfExtents[1]);
00136         btScalar lz=btScalar(2.)*(halfExtents[2]);
00137         const btScalar x2 = lx*lx;
00138         const btScalar y2 = ly*ly;
00139         const btScalar z2 = lz*lz;
00140         const btScalar scaledmass = mass * btScalar(.08333333);
00141 
00142         inertia[0] = scaledmass * (y2+z2);
00143         inertia[1] = scaledmass * (x2+z2);
00144         inertia[2] = scaledmass * (x2+y2);
00145 
00146 }

00148 btCapsuleShapeX::btCapsuleShapeX(btScalar radius,btScalar height)
00149 {
00150         m_collisionMargin = radius;
00151         m_upAxis = 0;
00152         m_implicitShapeDimensions.setValue(0.5f*height, radius,radius);
00153 }

00160 btCapsuleShapeZ::btCapsuleShapeZ(btScalar radius,btScalar height)
00161 {
00162         m_collisionMargin = radius;
00163         m_upAxis = 2;
00164         m_implicitShapeDimensions.setValue(radius,radius,0.5f*height);
